13 Farm Stays Around Mumbai To Tick All Your Unique Getaway Goals

By Krati
39337 Interested |
59K  Views
Photo courtesy: Oleander Farms Luxury Resort

Let's be honest for a moment here, the endless hustle of Mumbai can make you breathless even at the best of times. Though Mumbai has its charm with the honking horns, crowded streets, being the city of dreams, sometimes, we'd much rather trade those skyscrapers for some actual trees, wouldn't we?

We've hunted down the best farm stays near Mumbai for that ideal weekend escape. These are some hidden gems, not more than a few hours from Mumbai, yet far enough to feel like you are in another world altogether.

Overview

 
  1. 1. Megh Malhar Agro Tourism, Mulshi
  2. 2. Tooth Mountain Farms, Karjat
  3. 3. Arwa Farms, Dahanu
  4. 4. Prakriti Agro Farm, Jawhar
  5. 5. RutuParna Farm, Mulshi
  6. 6. Oleander Farms, Karjat
  7. 7. Karvanda Nature Stay, Kurvande
  8. 8. Utopia Famstay, Nashik
  9. 9. The Farm Retreat, Karjat
  10. 10. Krishivan, Alibaug
  11. 11. Manas Resort, Igatpuri
  12. 12. Saffron Stays SanvinaFarm, Karjat
  13. 13. Farmstay near Uran Nagav Beach, Airbnb

Here Is A List Of Best Farm Stays Near Mumbai

Megh Malhar Agro Tourism, Mulshi

Photo source: Megh Malhar Agro Tourism
Photo source: Megh Malhar Agro Tourism
Photo source: Megh Malhar Agro Tourism

Megh Malhar Agro Tourism, Satesai

See On Map
BOOK HERE

With private villas and cottages, Megh Malhar is a farm stay near Mumbai, ideal for a weekend getaway. With gorgeous views, lush farmland and surrounded by mango orchards, this is tranquility, guaranteed. Plus, you can opt for either a mountain or a river-facing room. Tough choice, but worth it.

Price: Starts at INR 5,800

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 12:30 PM & 10:30 AM

Distance From Mumbai: 121 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

Pro Tip: Get to know about this farmhouse stay near Mumbai in detail here. For couples staying here, we suggest their Treehouse for a romantic getaway.

Tooth Mountain Farms, Karjat

Photo source: Tooth Mountain Farms
Photo source: Tooth Mountain Farms
Photo source: Tooth Mountain Farms

Tooth Mountain Farms, Hatnoli

See On Map
BOOK HERE

This 20-acre estate is about as serene as it can get. With 5 boutique rooms, each with its theme, a spa on the property, and plenty of outdoor activities, there are a lot of reasons to recommend this one. If you're staying here, you won't feel like leaving because there's so much to do. You can go cycling, take a dip in the pool, or have homely food at their farm cafe, all with your furry friend.

Price: Starts at INR 6,400

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 1 PM & 11 AM

Distance From Mumbai: 54 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

Pro Tip: Check out our detailed review of this farm stay here.

Arwa Farms, Dahanu

Photo Source : Arwa Farms
Photo source: Arwa Farms
Photo source: Arwa Farms

Arwa Farms, Dahanu

See On Map
Call (+919820298876)

If you're looking to detox from Mumbai's hectic lifestyle (endless online meetings sound familiar?), then consider Arwa Farms. An organic farm stay that's nestled amid lush paddy fields, this is as rustic as it gets. And if you're an animal lover, well we think you'll be pretty pleased!

Price: Starts at INR 5,000

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 12 PM & 12 PM

Distance From Mumbai: 130 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

LBB-Tip: Read everything you need to know about this farm stay here.

Prakriti Agro Farm, Jawhar

Photo Source : Prakriti Agro Farm
Photo courtesy: Prakriti Agro Farm Resort
Photo courtesy: Prakriti Agro Farm Resort

Prakriti Agro Farm, Jawhar

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Surrounded by groves of mango and cashew nut trees, Prakriti Agro Farm offers comfortable rooms in natural surroundings. Plus you can dig into home-style khana, enjoy drives around surrounding Jawhar and take in the tranquillity and scenic vistas. They offer AC and Non-AC rooms and breakfast is included. 

Price: INR 1,600 upwards

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 12 PM & 11 AM

Distance From Mumbai: 134 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

RutuParna Farm, Mulshi

Photo source: Rutuparna Farm
Photo source: Rutuparna Farm
Photo source: Rutuparna Farm

Rutuparna Farm, Bhadas Bk.

See On Map
Call (+919545555365)

About as scenic as it gets, RutuParna Farm offers luxury accommodation in the heart of nature. Each of their seven rooms is beautifully appointed and features stunning views over the Mulshi Hills. Hearty Maharashtrian thalis ensure you're well-fed and happy and the cosy cottages are ideal for a romantic escape.

Price: INR 5,000 per couple, inclusive of all taxes and meals

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 11 AM & 12 PM

Distance From Mumbai: 136 kilometres

Social Media: Facebook

Pro Tip: Read more about this farm stay here.

Oleander Farms, Karjat

Photo courtesy: Oleander Farms Luxury Resort
Photo courtesy: Oleander Farms Luxury Resort
Photo courtesy: Oleander Farms Luxury Resort

Oleander Farms, Karjat

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Oleander Farms covers 180 acres of land blending luxury with nature. Hills green spaces, and lakes are what surround this family-friendly farm stay near Mumbai. For accommodations, they've got great options and you can pick from the cottages, rooms with the pool view, or rooms with the lawn view, each offering stunning views. If you want to relax, you can take a dip in the infinity pool or just enjoy the peaceful setting. They also have a fully functional gym where you can work out.

Price: Starts at INR 15,000

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 2 PM & 11 AM

Distance From Mumbai: 58 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

Karvanda Nature Stay, Kurvande

Photo source: Karvanda Nature Stay
Photo source: Karvanda Nature Stay
Photo source: Karvanda Nature Stay

Karvanda Nature Stays, Raigad

See On Map
Call (+918424881730)

Looking for a getaway that just feels like home? Karvanda Nature Stay is where you should be. It's the best farm stay near Mumbai offering a genuine experience, no frills, no hotel-style service just tasty homemade meals, and a cosy vibe. You'll get to experience nature up close, with options to cycle, take bullock cart rides (upon request), swim, and play badminton to keep busy. So, if you're into the idea of a basic, hands-on stay, you'll love this place.

Price: Starts at INR 6,490

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 12 PM & 10 AM

Distance From Mumbai: 90 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

LBB Tip: They don't offer room service, but they make exceptions for older folks, moms-to-be, and families with young kids.

Contact: 8424881730

Utopia Famstay, Nashik

Photo courtesy: Utopia Farmstay
Photo courtesy: Utopia Farmstay
Photo courtesy: Utopia Farmstay

Utopia Farmstay, Nashik

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Just a stone's throw away from Sula, York, and Soma Vineyards of Nashik, Utopia Farmstay is a gorgeous lakeside property offering views of calm Gangapur Lake to one side and the Sahyadri mountains to the other. Blending a little bit of country charm with smart design, this is the perfect spot for a quiet getaway. Every room pays homage to Maharashtra's tribal heritage showcasing genuine Adivasi art and built with pure teak.

Price: Starts at INR 5,000

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 2 PM & 11 AM

Distance From Mumbai: 173 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

LBB Tip: The farm stay also offers unique activities such as woodworking classes for guests who want to try something new compared to typical hotel stays.

The Farm Retreat, Karjat

Photo courtesy: The Farm Retreat
Photo courtesy: The Farm Retreat
Photo courtesy: The Farm Retreat

The Farm Retreat, Karjat

See On Map
BOOK HERE

The Farm Retreat puts nature front and centre and there's no one arguing with them! It's a 65+ acre organic farm that offers a sanctuary to nature enthusiasts who want to escape city life. If you're a guest here, you can expect to wake up to the sound of peacocks, breathing in fresh air, and discover the surrounding area that's almost untouched by industries for miles. The property houses 35 Gir cows that roam free while their waste enriches the farm's soil. This place allows people to slow down and get back in touch with nature.

Price: Starts at INR 3,000

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 12:30 PM & 10 AM

Distance From Mumbai: 75 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

Contact: 7738397750

Krishivan, Alibaug

Photo courtesy: Krishivan Agri Tourism
Photo courtesy: Krishivan Agri Tourism
Photo courtesy: Krishivan Agri Tourism

Krishivan Agri Tourism, Alibag

See On Map
Call (+919766311270)

If you want to get a real taste of rural life, check out Krishivan's huts built in the Adivasi style. These huts showcase traditional Warli paintings, giving you a peek into Maharashtra's tribal culture. This farm stay doesn't just let you kick back, it gets you up close to nature. For Real. You can try your hand at cow milking, egg collecting, or even chasing chickens around the place. When the monsoon hits, you can take a dip in the natural stream that runs through the farm. At other times, you can join in on organic farming activities. You won't get bored here, with fishing, pottery classes, and tractor rides to keep you busy. To top it all off, their kitchen serves up hearty, home-grown meals that make the experience complete.

Price: Starts at INR 3,000

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 2 PM to 12 PM

Distance From Mumbai: 87 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

Contact: 09766311270

Manas Resort, Igatpuri

Photo source: Manas Resort
Photo source: Manas Resort
Photo source: Manas Resort

Manas Resort, Nasik

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Nestled 1,900 ft above sea level in Igatpuri's foggy hills, Manas Resort offers an escape from urban living. It has an infinity pool facing the valley, along with a petting zoo and organic farm. During the rainy season and winter months, there's a thick fog over the entire property, creating a sense of a secret haven. Founded in 1991, it stands as one of Igatpuri's longest-running resorts. It provides various room options, each with spectacular views of the British-era bridge, trains passing by, and a river flowing below. It cannot get better than this.

Price: Starts at INR 5,000

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 1 PM & 10 AM

Distance From Mumbai: 117 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

Saffron Stays SanvinaFarm, Karjat

Photo courtesy: SaffronStays SanvinaFarm
Photo courtesy: SaffronStays SanvinaFarm
Photo courtesy: SaffronStays SanvinaFarm

SaffronStays SanvinaFarm, Karjat

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Surrounded by mountains, SanvinaFarm in Karjat is an intimate little retreat. Being a working farm, guests can take part in activities like planting saplings, plucking fresh produce, or milking cows. The property has huge mango and chickoo gardens, turmeric farms, plantations of red chilies, tomatoes, and much more. The interior is equally charming with antique artefacts from Ahmedabad's historical havelis. If adventure is your call, you can even opt for a guided forest walk, river rafting, or a quad bike ride.

Price: INR 24,000 per night for 4 rooms

Check-in & Check-out Timings: 11 AM & 12 PM

Distance From Mumbai: 90 kilometres

Social Media: Instagram

Farmstay near Uran Nagav Beach, Airbnb

Photo source: Airbnb
Photo source: Airbnb
Photo source: Airbnb

574 Fernandes Wadi, Navi Mumbai

BOOK HERE

Spread across 2 acres of land, this stunning property listed on Airbnb is a boutique farmstay that practices sustainable living with essential modern comforts. Located an hours drive away from Mumbai, the bungalow has 3 rooms, a pool and can make specialised farm-to-table meals (on request). A pet-friendly property, it has ample space for your furry babies to play in the sea-touch coconut groove. An ideal place for you if you want to disconnect from the city and plug into nature. Think: rhythms of sea, swaying palms and golden sunset perfect for those sunkissed photos.

Price: Starts from INR 23,965 

Check-in & Check-out Timings: Check-in between 2 PM 9:00PM and Check-out before 11 AM

Distance from Mumbai: Approximately 60 kilometres
